Решил поиграть в когда-то неплохую игру за маньяка и понял, как же всё-таки она упала и стала казуалом для выживших. Я хорошо бегаю за мана и мне нужно немного времени, чтобы поймать первого, как вдруг при его поимке мне зачинили 3 гена, думаю вам ясно, что даже если затуннелить челика, это будет 5 генов = одна смерть выжившего. Мне очень жаль, что это игра для пати выживших и одного тамады.

玩了快一年也不过是闲来无事打两把放松心情罢了，低段还是要排挺久的，几分钟左右吧。不晓得上面的风景又如何窥伺。建议以之为放松心情的小游戏，在低段挂挂人，还是很解气的。
Great game, definitely recommend! Good solo, even better with friends

I got this game when it first came out, and honestly wasn't too bad at the time.
Just started playing the game again, and I can't put it down. This game has improved so much and is a ton of fun with friends. I highly recommend.
-Edit-
After playing for about 600 hours I'd say the game is a ton of fun even though its wildly unbalanced and theres lots of issues/bugs especially after a chapter release. Still would recommend though!
这是一款气氛十分欢快的游戏

游戏性非常棒，但是匹配机制实在是太差了，二十段能匹配到七八段的人，希望能优化一下匹配机制吧

的确是优化匹配机制了，不过这更新感觉真的没用，不仅10几段的玩自己不熟悉的屠夫排不到人了，而且匹配到的人仍然经常会出现紫段绿段甚至红段，这新屠夫我就玩过两局，能定出来这么高的分段吗？我觉得不能，希望继续优化匹配机制吧

能不能修一修你们的BUG？错误代码111，打半天一局白打，要么就段位更新失败，还有这阴间气场，是真的看不到东西
An sich gutes Spiel, macht mit Freunden am meisten Spaß. Trotzdem gibt es viele Bugs und Fehler, die ich hier nun nicht alle auflisten werde.

操作單純但難以精通的不對稱競技遊戲,
和朋友一起玩可以靈活配合技能組,甚至直接分配維修組、嘲諷組,被掛直接依掛數分配救援的人,
如果玩人單排就只能走比較泛用的打法,如果隊友技術、觀念判斷差很多,偶爾會有無力的遊戲體驗,
遊戲設計的平衡是傾向"2死2逃",所以先有點心理建設,被針對也不需要放棄遊戲

對新手來說,沒3D暈建議從玩鬼開始上手,能習慣整個遊戲流程、適應找人追人的技術,
玩人的時候再依自己玩鬼的心得研擬策略,
當然如果有老手朋友指導最快,畢竟鬼的等待時間仍然會超過3分鐘,而人只要20秒內

เกม สนุกดีนะ แต่ balance ของ ฆาตกร บางตัวยังดูโกงไปนะ โดยเฉพาะ add-on ทั้งหลาย ส่วนผู้รอดชีวิต อะเห็นแค่จำนวนมากกว่า ก็ ไม่ปรับปรุงอะไรเลย ทำให้  บัฟ แต่ ฆาตกร ก็เข้าใจนะถ้าเขา เจอกับพวกมาเป็น party มันจะลำบาก แต่ก็ควร ทำให้มันสมดุลหน่อย.ผู้รอดชีวิต บางตา เจอตอน แรงค์ 10กว่า แม่ม มาทำเควส เสร็จก็โยนเกมไปเลยไม่สนโลกไม่สนแรงค์ตัวเอง นั้นแหละ ฮะ ลาก คนอื่นซวยไปด้วย ทำให้เกมไม่สนุกเลย 
             ข้อเสียในเกมมันยังมีปัญหาหยิบย้อยเยอะมาก จะยกขื้นมาละกันไม่อธิบายอะไรมาก เช่น : อนิเมชั่น ฟาดของฆาตกร ถ้าใครเล่นฆาตกรเป็น เราจะรู้ว่า ในระหว่าง อนิเมชั่น ฟาดของฆาตกร กำลังดำเนินยุนั้นเราสามาดหมุน เมาส์ ได้ จนสุดข้อ ดังนั้น ทุก 1คลิก ของการโจมตี สามารถเหวียงให้โดนได้ เอาง่ายๆผู้รอดชีวิต จู๊คหลบด้านข้างยังไงก็โดน ถ้าตั้งเมาค์ ให้DPI สูงๆ มันเหมือน สกิล 1 ของ Dariusใน LOL เลย
              สรุป เกมนี่ ต้องมีเพื่อนเล่นจิงๆนะแหละ ถ้าจะเอาเกมนี่ แนะนำหาเพื่อน ประมาณสัก ตี้ 1ไปเลย ถ้าไปเล่นผู้รอดชีวิต คนเดียว มีหวด คีย์บอร์ท แน่ ถืงสมดุลเกมจะไม่เป็นมีกับ ผู้รอดชีวิต ก็ตาม แต่ผู้ พัฒนา คงมองเห็นสิ่งที่ตัวเองไม่สามารถ เนิร์ฟ ผู้รอดชีวิตได้อย่างนืง............... คือความสามัคคี ของเพื่อนในปาร์ตี้ยังไงละ 
(เล่นเป็น ฆาตกร ไปสะหัวร้อนไปลงกับผู้รอดชีวิต ถ้าเพื่อนไม่ว่างสักคนเชื่อผม ดีแล้วไม่ต้องมีคนแปลกหน้าเป็นภาระ)
ฝากถืงผู้พัฒนาส้นตีน เอาระบบ เปิดไมค์สื่อสารมาได้แล้ว ถ้ามืงจะ บัฟฆาตกร ทุกตัวให้มันเก่งชิปหายอะ

Задумка интересная, реализация - отвратительно: если выйти, пока идет анимация смерти на крюке - получаешь штраф. Догадались сделать возможность скрывать ID игрока в настройках придумали, а скопировать этот самый ID - нет. Тоже самое с проверкой запущенного Steam'a, нет, чтобы сразу проверить, мы загрузим все ресурсы и кучу всего, а потом дадим возможность нажать кнопку ВЫЙТИ - гениально...
Спасибо за испорченное настроение...

Dead By Daylight is one of those games that you will have times enjoying the game and other times where you will be hating some of it's design. Nonetheless, the game is great and fun at times and I do recommend that you do play it at least once. The devs are always adding new content for everyone to enjoy and they are always adding some fixes or something new. Getting in chases, getting flashlight saves, throwing satisfying hatchets, all of those things are some examples as to why I love playing this game. With their recently added Archives, there are so many other things to do and rewards you can get along with the Rift. The game is not exactly perfect though. There are still many bugs and issues that still need to be fixed. However, with their upcoming new content everything seems to be getting overhauls and fixes. I am really excited for what they will be doing. In short, this game is great but has its issues.

Update: I have changed my recommendation from yes to no, and back a few times, as the devs introduce new elements or redesign existing ones.  The problem is that these things never seem to to make things better, and usually make things worse.  In recent developer notes they mentioned that their data indicated something so they were going to make some changes.  The something their data indicated was something that players have been telling them for years that they scoffed at.  

The devs, one in particular, can be extremely condescending to anyone expressing anything negative about the game, and dismissive of any suggestion that there are problems. You can't fix problems if you refuse to acknowledge that they exist.  The skill-based matchmaking system that was being introduced that made me change my last vote to "Yes", was not based on skill, at all, and turned out to be worse than the previous system.  

There is a new update in the works, designed to change the meta, but does so in a rather heavy handed way.  Rather than buffing all the bad perks to make them worth using as an alternative to existing perks, they are nerfing meta perks to the point of being useless.  Granted, they will be buffing some previously mediocre perks that will likely become the new meta, but that is not how a meta should be.  It should be driven by the players and their creativity, not by the devs deciding what perks they want to be meta, and which ones they don't.  I have never seen a game run like this.  They should have spent their development time improving all of the bad perks to make them viable alternatives.  Instead they waste a lot of time on lateral changes and sometimes changes that are huge steps backwards. I really want to love this game, but with this development team, i doubt the game will ever get to that point.  I definitely can't recommend it to new players.


Original review:
Interesting concept.  An asynchronous PvP (1 v 4) game set in the middle of a slasher flick. You can play as one of a team of 4 potential survivors, or as a brutal serial killer trying to kill them.  It could have been a lot of fun, and has had its moments, but the game has a lot of problems, not the least of which is the community.  Granted, all communities have toxic members, but this one is worse than most, simply because you have a natural rift between those that consider themselves mains of one side or the other.

The asynchronous nature of the game also creates tremendous balancing problems, made almost impossible to fix because each side has a completely different perspective, and they can only see one side of things, so there is very little objectivity.    Feedback tends to favor whatever side that that particular player is a main of.  Player that play both sides are largely ignored.  It is made worse by the devs lack of interest in curbing the toxicity in any meaningful way.  At times they have even fed into it, by actually mocking players of one side, allowing mains from the other side to pile on.

The worst part is probably the matchmaking, which really just throws players together.  While there is a ranking system, is is pretty much useless, as it has absolutely nothing to do with player skill, so players will be at ranks they don't deserve, simply due to playing enough games, then they get beaten up by players far more skilled than they are. Even if MM worked, this would be a huge issue, but it doesn't.  Brand new player can be placed with/against players with thousands of hours of gameplay under their belts.  The game can't even use the poor ranking system properly for matchmaking.

Naturally, new, less experienced players being matched against far more experienced players has several drawbacks, as you would imagine.  Firstly, it is no fun getting destroyed by far more experienced players.  Secondly, you can't get proper feedback.  Not only do you have two sides with vastly different viewpoints, but you also have less skilled players going up against more skilled players, leading the less skilled players to believe that the other side is OP.  it has also led to players bullying other players, intentionally, to amuse themselves.  

Yes, these things could potentially get fixed, except the devs have shown a lack of ability to understand how to balance the game.  Recent balancing attempts were poorly thought out, and has led to even more toxicity within the community.  They are supposedly working on a new matchmaking system, but who knows how that will turn out.  What we do know is that they will be hiding the system from us, so we will never know if it is working, or not...at least we will have no way of proving it.
